page.title: 13INDUSTRY.
page.content: {The Poron Factory.} The factory opened in 1964.During the war the sites were used for gun emplacements.Two factories were built one either side of the road.In 1984 the lower factory was closed.This was due to installing new machinery.The modern automatic machines are 10 times faster than the old,so not so much factory space was required.Each machine costs approx Â£40,000 and one man can operate 5 machines.The metal moulds used on the machines to produce different shapes are made in Kent,to the requirement of the customer.The factory keeps about 300 moulds so they can produce items when the customer requires.40 people are employed,39 full time,1 part time.75% are men and 25% women.10 (includes 1 part time) are office and managment.The raw materials come from Germany.
